593420.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Volume 26 - Things that go Bump Pack 2 (Token Pack)
593420.description:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Vol26 - Things that go Bump Pack 2

This token pack consist of 28 uniquely designed, 3D rendered VTT tokens, depicting various creatures of the night (Ghasts, Starving Vampires, Wights, Wraiths, Wormwrought Zombies, Zombie Rotters, and Ghouls).
These tokens are suitable for use with any fantasy roleplaying game and are optimized for virtual table top (VTT) play. Darkwoulfe's token packs help you fill your game session with character!
This Token Pack includes:
  • 4 Ghasts
  • 4 Ghouls
  • 4 Starving Vampires
  • 4 Wights
  • 4 Wormwroughts
  • 4 Wraiths
  • 4 Zombies
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
